short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool identifies test-related fields (Account name, Credit Card Number, CVC, Expiry Date), enabling Stripe's test CC usage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is TestCoach?

Test payment forms:
Use TestCoach to test 120 different card payment scenarios; working payments, declined payments fraud prevention, invalid data, disputes and refunds across all of the card brands and countries supported by Stripe. 

Record your results:
Your results are stored in your TestCoach account for easy access from within TestCoach and Stripe Dashboard with the TestCoach Stripe Marketplace app installed. 

Share your results:
Your results can be shared with other members of your team to quickly resolve issues found in your Stripe implementation or connected e-commerce systems.
